title: COMPANY overview page
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a list of all COMPANIES
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* The overview page displays a subset of all COMPANY nodes. → Status Code \`200\`
* When there exist more than 100 COMPANIES then only the first 100 are displayed.
* The COMPANIES are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* Each node is presented with its primary information.
* Each node contains a thumbnail image.
* Each node links to the respective COMPANY detail page.
* An error message is shown when there exist no COMPANY nodes (edge case, mainly relevant for testing purposes). → Status Code \`200\`
